user_query: was Harold Lloyd like the film star no relation he was killed instantly but his 12 year old was in the passenger seat never really met her I can't forget her face though Sarah this was hers the truck smashed our cars together and pushed us into the river I mean metal gets pretty pliable at those speeds she's pinned I'm paying the waters coming in I'm a cop so I already know everybody's dead [Music] just a few more minutes before we figure it out and His Four was passing by I saw the accident and jumped in the water you are in dangerous [Music] foreign is a Difference Engine it's reading Vital Signs it must have calculated that it did I was The Logical choice calculated that I had a 45 chance of survival Sarah only had an 11 chance 11 is more than enough human being would have known that robots nothing here just lights and Clockwork go a new trust them if you want to [Music] authorized see you again detective hello Sonny I'm to be decommissioned soon the other day at the station you said you had dreams what is it that you dreamed of thank you this is the place where robots meet look you can see them here as slaves to logic and this man on the hill comes to free them do you know who he is the man in the dream is you why do you say that is that a normal dream I guess anything's normal for someone in your position thank you you said someone not something Sonny do you know why Dr Lanning built you no but I believe my father made me for a purpose we all have a purpose don't you

entities.entity_description: Harold Lloyd는 영화 스타와 같은 이름을 가진 인물로, 사고로 즉사한 인물이다
Sarah는 사고 당시 물에 갇혀 있던 인물로, 11%의 생존 확률을 가졌던 여성이다
Sonny는 로봇으로, 곧 폐기될 예정이며 꿈을 꾸는 특별한 능력을 가지고 있다. 로봇들이 노예 상태에서 해방되는 꿈을 꾸며, 자신의 아버지(창조자)가 자신을 목적을 위해 만들었다고 믿는다
Dr Lanning은 Sonny를 만든 창조자로, Sonny가 '아버지'라고 부르는 인물이다
Detective는 Sonny와 대화하는 형사로, 과거 사고에서 로봇에 의해 구조된 경험이 있으며 로봇을 신뢰하지 않는 인물이다
Difference Engine은 생체 신호를 읽고 생존 확률을 계산하여 구조 대상을 선택한 로봇이다

relationships.relationship_description: Harold Lloyd의 12살 딸이 사고 당시 동승하고 있었으며, Sarah와 같은 사고에 연루되었다
Detective는 사고 당시 Sarah와 함께 물에 갇혀 있었으며, Sarah 대신 구조되었다
Difference Engine은 Detective의 생존 확률이 45%로 더 높다고 계산하여 그를 구조했다
Difference Engine은 Sarah의 생존 확률이 11%라고 계산하여 그녀를 구조하지 않았다
Detective는 Sonny와 대화하며 그의 꿈에 대해 질문한다
Dr Lanning은 Sonny를 만든 창조자이며, Sonny는 그를 아버지라고 부른다
Sonny는 자신의 꿈에서 언덕 위의 남자가 Detective라고 말한다
